name: Visual Toolbox for Classification
body:
### Authors
Amit Meir - amitmeir@uw.edu
Yoni Fintzi - fintzij@uw.edu

### Running Instructions
1. Download the repository.
2. Open as an R shiny project in R-Studio. 
3. Click on the 'Run App' button.

### Links to Poster and Article
[Poster](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BzHxgs4ueow-WW91ai10eWVwVGM&authuser=0), [article](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0Bw9NSRaxcsCNTjRLb1JJTUk3aTQ&authuser=0).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
